description: [Avatar](http://avatar.ai) is a distributed "operating system for the internet" running inside the web browser. It allows for secure messaging (think email, social networks) and distributed data storage, employing a policy of "privacy and data security by default". Building its own encrypted P2P network, it does not rely upon any central authority.
ohloh_description: This plugin provides a taglib for displaying avatars. At the moment we only support gravatars (globally-recognized avatars).
name: Avatar
